name: Yi_Tech_Tree_ExtraVanilla
title: Yuoki Tech Tree Extra Vanilla
author: MnHebi
description: Reduce information overload of using Yuoki's Mod's by unlocking the Yuoki Industries and Engines Addon (Optional) through a tech tree. Changes by MnHebi to further integrate Yuoki's with vanilla to make advances feel natural. Also increased tech difficulty. Original mod by Peppe.
